meanings.definition: To automatically dial a telephone number.
meanings.sent1: I set up the phone to autodial my mom's number.
meanings.sent2: The system can autodial emergency services in case of an accident.
meanings.sent3: The robot thought it could autodial its robot friends for a chat.
meanings.sent4: The alarm clock seemed to autodial the morning with its loud ringing.
meanings.sent5: The autodial feature on my phone makes calling my friends so easy.

meanings.definition: A device that automatically dials telephone numbers.
meanings.sent1: The autodial on the office phone saves time for making calls.
meanings.sent2: My grandma uses an autodial to reach me quickly.
meanings.sent3: The autodial in the movie was a magical phone that dialed the future.
meanings.sent4: The autodial in the car seemed like a helpful little assistant.
meanings.sent5: I wish my phone had an autodial like the one in the sci-fi movie.
